name: Get Supplies
description: We need rakes, shovels, trash bags, gloves, and a first aid kit

name: Bring Snacks
description: We'll need plenty of water, trail mix, and maybe lemonade

name: Volunteer Check-in
description: Someone needs to confirm which volunteers are present

name: Separate Recyclables
description: Go through the unsorted items and identify which can be recycled

name: Haul Trash
description: Person responsible for taking the trash to the landfill

name: Haul Recyclables
description: Person responsible for taking recyclables to the recycling center

name: First Aid
description: Person with some skills and heart

name: After Party Coordination
description: Someone should book a big table for us to celebrate afterward

name: Transportation
description: We need a volunteer with a big car or van to drive

name: Playground Repair
description: Someone who can fix things needs to look at the swing set

name: Green Thumb
description: We would love to have some flowers planted in the park

name: Mowing
description: There are several areas that need mowed. Do you have a big mower?

name: Edging
description: If you have a trimmer you're our hero!

name: Get Donated Plants
description: Can you convince area greenhouses to give us plants to plant?

name: Paparazzi
description: We would love to have someone document this

name: Social Media Guru
description: Can you help advertise this event and bring in more volunteers?
